question: [Practice] Svenska: Ange which integer bin occurs most frequently utifran histogrammet.

qas.question: [Practice] Svenska: Ange which integer bin occurs most frequently utifran histogrammet.
[Note] Deutsch: Gib how many samples were used in total anhand des Histogramms an.
[Calm] Deutsch: Gib how many entries fall inside the modal bin anhand des Histogramms an.
